content: So, to be clear, this isn't an "official" working group -- maybe we can update the description to make that clearer?
Updated, it won't change the message that has been posted by the bot, but the stream list is updated.
OK, great. I'm happy for people to have a space to chat, but a bit wary of the precedent of creating streams for "unofficial" things.
Maybe I'm too cautious, I don't know. Just registering the concern =)
